message: It's so sad man, it just felt like nothing could be done and a sad ending is already set in stone. I also can't believe this show is from 2005, the quality is so good. I guess the reason is because it's kyoani. It's a really great show for me

if i watched this in 2005 i probably woulda given it a 9/10 but modern day id say 7/10 -me rating it isnt fair because anime back in 2005 were still pioneering/ laying the roads for anime today. it was confusing at times but i can kinda understand the story.
Did they really had to play the opening? Makes stuff hit 10x times worseðŸ˜”
